Reviews.Title: “HORRIBLE! NOT RECOMMENDED!”
Reviews.Author: Felix K
Reviews.Content: PLEASE pay attention to other reviewers! One good thing from this hotel is the receptionist, Mr. Ahmed. The others thing are totally minus! I can truly say, that this is not hotel, but HOSTEL! The information that is written are not completely true. I traveled there with three friends, and according to the information, which I received by phone call, that I will get family room, with one big bed and two single beds. We got picked by one of the worker, Mr. Murat, who is acting friendly, but fake. They took us to the hotel and we met the friendly receptionist, Mr. Ahmed. All of sudden they said that the room are full and they transferred us into another hotel, which is also the part of AST Hotel. They said, that it is a new building with new furniture. We arrived there at 1 in the morning and we agreed to move, since we were very tired and need to sleep. The location of new hotel is quite far and we had to walk. The building is located near the vile area. And we saw that the building is not ready yet to be occupied. No internet connection, the floor is dirty and full of sands, the TV is not working, no BREAKFAST and the view is HORRIBLE! The more minus thing is that they gave us one room with one king bed size and one single bed and they suggest all of us to sleep there! We are not a PIG! We pay for it! And we have argued with the porter, and he is not very polite and really disrespect the guests! And to solve the problem that night, we decided to get our money back and find other hotel. But they offered us to add more room and it is used only for a night. We disagree and told them that we will move in the lunch time and still we asked for our money back. But suddenly we got information that we can stay at the main hotel at the lunch time. At 10.00 in the morning the porter knocked our room and asked us to get out, because the room will be taken by other guests. This is one of the prove of lack of service and hospitality! We argued and we left the hotel at 12.00 as agreed. Once again we met Mr. Ahmed, and with his smile and hospitality he welcomed us to the room that we order. The room is nice but the toilet is horrible. The water works very small. The view is horrible and you can not see the sea view as it is mentioned on the information. The breakfast is only bread with jams and coffee or tea. Then at night, the General manager of the hotel, Mr. Reis Tastan, talked to one of my friend with high tone in front of other guest at the lobby. He complained us, by making trouble. WOW! He is totally BLIND that his hotel is like a pig's cage! Dirty and smell awful! He argued with us and one really disrespectful thing is he insisted us to go out from the hotel. But we disagreed since he won't return our money! Shortly, I DON'T RECOMMEND you this hotel! But if you enjoy wasting your energy by arguing with stupid porter and general manager, they will welcome you. And one more thing, at the time I was checking out in the early morning (05.00), I saw three guests are sleeping on the couch. I believe that they experienced the same problem and they did not get the room! But yes, I have to say that Mr. Ahmed is really nice guy with pure heart to help people there! And yes, don't order airport shuttle from the hotel. order it at the agency near the hotel. The hotel will charge you 20 euro, while the agency will charge you only 5 euro! Enjoy you trip!

Reviews.Title: “Ast hotel - great bargain”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Hotel is undergoing renovation at the moment. New rooms look simply fabulous and will likely be done within the next month or two. Old rooms are rather shabby, but all rooms are being renovated. Price was a bargain, likely as it was the off-season. Management exceptionally helpful, courteous, and accommodating. Included breakfast was simple, rather limited, and European-style, consisting of coffee, water, sliced baguette with butter and jam; better breakfasts could be found at other hotels we stayed at.

Reviews.Title: “Pictures say more than a thousand words”
Reviews.Author: schranzkind
Reviews.Content: Check my pictures. This is the worst place ive ever seen! Greedy hosts also.. never again!

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant”
Reviews.Author: kama342
Reviews.Content: Me and my friend stayed in this hotel one week and had a magnificent stay. Everything here is excellent! If Turks are well known with their hospitality, the Neorion hotel family is much more; they really make you feel the most special! And the hotel itself is very new with beautifully decorated big rooms and high standard sauna department downstairs. Also it is ideally situated for all the city sights, walking distance almost everywhere. The breakfast is very tasteful and nicely untill 11 am., so you dont have to hurry in the mornings. So you really feel you are on holidays! This was our third visit in Istanbul and because of the Neorion, definately the best! Next year we are coming back and for sure staying in this brilliant hotel again!

Reviews.Title: “very nice place”
Reviews.Author: ali a
Reviews.Content: we was there few nights the staff is very kind and helpful the hotel is nice and clean 24 hourse hot tea and coffee was ready in a day we drinked 5 time turkish the hotel very near to sultan Ahmet mosqe its really place nice to stay and the recepionist Ahmet was very kind and helpfull i recomond this this hotel i will come back

Reviews.Title: “Best stay in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Dakus N
Reviews.Content: The very good hotel : friendly, hospitable, helpful, excellent location !!!!

Reviews.Title: “Best place to feel Sultanahmet and old Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Vlad S
Reviews.Content: This place is real old Istanbul, also good staff and family atmosphere

Reviews.Title: “Location OK, guesthouse overpriced”
Reviews.Author: Curi0usM0nkey
Reviews.Content: The location for this guesthouse was good, but unfortunately the whole place is rather dark, bit of a suffocating feel, rooms were really small, breakfast wasn't amazing. So the price didn't quite deliver the value we expected. Staff were nice.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Madu_Raha
Reviews.Content: The staff was really friendly and helpful. Great location close to all the tourist sights in Sultanahmet, but 'behind' the main tourist streets making the experience more local and authentic. Nice and clean rooms. Good view from the roof terrace. We would choose this hostel again.

Reviews.Title: “Old, but authentic”
Reviews.Author: comnen
Reviews.Content: Stayed for a weekend there with my mom in March. The hotel is simple, not pretending, but it is really authentic. Breakfast rather poor, wiFi connection available, bathroom old, with sitting shower. The staff was really helpful and gave some advice. Old creaky staircases, not too clean in a room. But for that price and location you get the best deal.

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel in a good location”
Reviews.Author: Aditya098
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Ast hotel when I visited Istanbul last year. It is located in the Sultanahmet area and is pretty close to the main attractions of the city. Though the hotel was very difficult to find and it is advised to call the hotel owner and meet at the tram station instead of going looking on your own. The room I stayed in was comfortable though the bathroom could have been better. There was no balcony with the room make it feel a little dingy. The breakfast buffet was nice and sumptuous. The hotel owner was very helpful. I would recommend this hotel to a bunch of guys or friends traveling in a group rather than couples.

Reviews.Title: “i am very disappointed”
Reviews.Author: metemuo
Reviews.Content: this hotel was the worst one i have ever been in Turkey.We got no fresh towels,not good breakfast,no bar at all,no maid to come and tidy up rooms. This was very disappointing for us and I really dont recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “A hotel of last resort”
Reviews.Author: wazza2904
Reviews.Content: the business card of the manager says "You will feel nostagia with us" . Great if you want to be nostagic for 1960s shabby boarding house. Unfortunately it is not priced at 1960s prices. Rooms are not serviced daily, toiletries are a watered down soap dispenser on the shower wall. The wireless internet is intermittent. The best thing about this location is that there is a fantastic restaurant called Cesme just down the road.

Reviews.Title: “Kool Staff”
Reviews.Author: rashid_baig1510
Reviews.Content: We had a good experience at the hotel especially the man in Reception Ahmet is a very friendly man i can recomment it to any one and its not very expensive either.

Reviews.Title: “Bad, Bad, Bad”
Reviews.Author: sagitario79
Reviews.Content: Chose another hotel, The room I had was dirty, mold on the walls, bad matress, strong urine smell in bath room, room view on a dump and breakfast not even worth mentioning

Reviews.Title: “worst experience ever”
Reviews.Author: Travellingberliner
Reviews.Content: We reserved the hotel thru the internet. Besides getting a room with a view onto two airconditioners on the outside fireescapestaircase, which ran with great noice depending on the usuage by other guests, the breakfast was lousy. Furthermore, we tried for three days to get a receipt for our payment - without any success. The night before our departure when asking again for it, the manager told us that the internet agency was not giving him our pre-payment and that the price excluded a tax of 18 %. If we were willing to pay those 18 % he would give us a receipt over the sum he got from us in cash, but not what we had payed altogether and if we insisted any further he would throw us out of the hotel. Needless to say we did insist on a proper receipt and spent a rather restless night - since we could not search for a new place that evening.

Reviews.Title: “normal hotel for with good location”
Reviews.Author: Maksin
Reviews.Content: Good location, nice view from the terrace, friendly staff but there are some problem with bathroom and cleanliness of the rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Dont say there worst hotel ever, not even value for money”
Reviews.Author: Dianne05
Reviews.Content: No hot water for 2 days, we stayed 3 nights and they never cleaned the room, made the bed, nothing. We were not expecting too much for the price but the photos must have been taken 20 years ago. Don't even consider this place.

Reviews.Title: “you book and pay online and u go there they say we're full.. ((stay away))”
Reviews.Author: alrobaish
Reviews.Content: that's what happened to me and a swiss person I met there .. I booked and paid online and when I went there they say we're full.. then they give a room in another hotel (a very dirty hotel .. no fridge .. no wardrop .. no air conditioning ) and they charge you the same price .. you can't do anything because you already paid .. and the manager has a bad attitude .... simply ((( liers))

Reviews.Title: “quiet place , value deal , great hospitality and close to many attraction places”
Reviews.Author: mitrames
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for one week . the room was very clean , and stuff were very helpful . we enjoyed staying at this hotel and If one day decided to travel to istanbul I will book this place. Such a comfort and great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Familiar, warm atmosphere, amazing price. Wonderfull surprise”
Reviews.Author: SwankMadrid
Reviews.Content: The manager is really friendly and makes everything he can to make your stay as comfortable as possible. It is quite well located, in a local neighbourhood. It allows you to be in touch with people you'ld never meet if you are in a more turistic location. It only takes 10 minutes walking to get to Sultanahmet, where you could visit Sta SofÃ­a and The Blue Mosque(and a railway station is located there). Rooms are quite acceptable to the price you pay. Air conditioner, plasma tv with lots of channels, and a fridge. The views from the roofflat are amazing. Watch the nightfall while taking a free tea it's a pleasure. If we go to Istanbul again, we sure book here again!

Reviews.Title: “Quite and Warm atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: SarthakSam
Reviews.Content: After our horrible stay of one night at Fatima Sultan hotel, we stepped out to search for another hotel. Most of them were full because of high season. Then we walked into AST hotel. We were greeted by the elder brother (Ahmed was his name I believe and older of the two brothers who own this hotel). He confirmed us two rooms emptying. The hotel is near Kuchu Ayasofia (Small Ayasofia). Its 10 mins walk ...on the backstreet from all major tourist attractions and just 5 mins walk from Marmara Sea. The rooms were clean, big (double to all the 5 hotels we stayted during our trip from Istanbul to Goreme) and comfortable. Bathroom was small but not much of problem. Hot water and quick shower refreshed us up. Ahmed always offered us tea/coffee kept in the lobby. Guests can help themselves whenever they like and its free. Breakfast is served in the restaurant on groundfloor but one can carry his/her plate to terrace. It had a lovely view of Marmara Sea. Even though we stayed for a night but all of us loved it very much. The younger brother (of the owners) drove us to Airport. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to stay away from all the crowd and would like to be in walking distance of all places.

Reviews.Title: “super friendly and helpful”
Reviews.Author: nstanger
Reviews.Content: The staff at AST always had smiles for us and suggestions on things to do. The rooms were clean and the breakfast was very turkish. The rooftop patio will be a wonderful place to have breakfast once the final installations are finished. Great views of the Marmaris sea!

Reviews.Title: “a nice place for nice people”
Reviews.Author: poursayah
Reviews.Content: Everytime I think about Istanbul I remember a good hotel in a good city with polite and helpful staff. I and my wife were there for one week. Everymorning we had a good breakfast and then we go up the roof that had beautiful view of Marmara sea. Historical building such as blue mosque and Topokopi Palace are near. But it had a disadvantage, temrature of water in bath was unstable. but air conditioer of rooms was good. I sugesst this hotel if you want a clean silent hotel near the hisorical places in Istanbul

Reviews.Title: “a really familiar atmosphere...”
Reviews.Author: camcam_10
Reviews.Content: we stayed here for one week. we had the room at the last floor and the view was very amazing. everyone in the hotel is so kindly and you can spend your time in a relaxing atmosphere. C&A

Reviews.Title: “Very very noisy”
Reviews.Author: Eleanore42
Reviews.Content: We had two rooms in this hotel - the first room was nice enough, but on the road, which was loud enough to keep us awake most of the night. The second room was at the back of the hotel, but it was pokey and small, the bathroom door didn't close at all (it didn't even fit in the door way), the hair dryer didn't work, we could hear every word spoken in the room next door and there was a smell of gas whenever we opened the window. All the rooms come off one stone / marble stair well, so all night and day there's the sound of footsteps and banging up and down the stairs. There is also no door between the reception and the stair well, so all night long our sleep was interrupted by the sounds of people arriving and of the men on reception chatting. The staff were nice enough, they tried to fix the bathroom electrics and the hairdryer, but gave up when it didn't prove possible, and didn't attempt to provide an alternative. I would definitely not recommend this hotel - we were transfered there when the hotel we had booked had to close for financial reasons, and it was far too noisy; the electrics were terrible, the bathroom facilities were cramped (there was nothing between the shower and the rest of the bathroom, so it flooded in seconds) and sparse (which made it all the worse when the bathroom door wouldn't close!!). You can definitely find better than this for you money, and I wish we had.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value, wonderfully welcoming people”
Reviews.Author: grayda
Reviews.Content: We spent an excellent week at the Ast hotel. Really don't understand the negative reviews - it's like they are writing about an entirely different place. Nice room, excellent location, and the brothers who run the place are wonderfully friendly. Only slight hitch was that in spite of having a confirmed booking, they had arranged for us to spend the first two nights in a different hotel, but that said, it was close by, they took us there and brought us back, and gave us a very nice room when we did finally get to Ast.

HotelInfo.Name: Ast Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Kadirga Liman Cad. No 137/A, Istanbul 34211, Turkey
